Package weka.server

Interface Summary
NamedTask Extension of the Task interface for tasks with a name/ID.
Scheduled Interface to something that uses a schedule.
 

Class Summary
AddSlaveServlet Registers a slave server with this Weka server instance.
ExecuteTaskServlet Accepts a task for execution.
GetScheduleServlet Returns the schedule associated with a task.
GetServerLoadServlet Returns the load of this Weka server instance.
GetTaskListServlet Returns a list of tasks registered with this Weka server instance.
GetTaskResultServlet Get the result of a task (if available).
GetTaskStatusServlet Get the status of a task.
PurgeTaskServlet Purge one or more tasks from the server.
RootServlet The main servlet.
Schedule Class for configuring a recurring or one-off schedule.
SetLastExecutionServlet Used by slaves to pass back execution date-time information for tasks to their master.
SetTaskStatusServlet Used by slaves to pass back task status info to their master
WekaServer The main server program that launches tasks (either locally or on registered remote slaves).
WekaServer.ConnectionManager Provides singleton access to the Apache commons HTTP connection manager.
WekaServlet Base class for Weka servlets.
WekaTaskMap Class that maintains a map of tasks for execution.
WekaTaskMap.NamedClassDelegator Wrapper NamedTask that delegates to the task it wraps around.
WekaTaskMap.SimpleNamedTask Simple wrapper that wraps a NamedTask interface around a Task.
WekaTaskMap.WekaTaskEntry Information about a task.
 

Enum Summary
Schedule.OccurrenceWithinMonth  
Schedule.Repeat
